Message:
The troupe found out pretty
quickly that I was a witch,
but they didn’t mind.

Because while they may not
have been witches themselves,
they, too, were the black
sheep of the lot.

I started out as an assistant,
and before long,
they gave me a test to
see what my act would be.

I was a clown, a trapeze artist,
a beast master...
The only thing I was good at...
I lived a pretty happy life after that.

All while concealing the fact that
I was a witch from the audience,
of course.
